content.rendered:
The First Token-Back Rewards Program

Introducing the ProperT Token! Purchase any good or service with ProperT and receive a 5% token-back reward to spend anywhere.

25

Made possible by

ProperT rewards
program explained

Buyers can acquire and use ProperT (PROPT) to purchase goods and services at any ForumPay-enabled merchant or business and will automatically receive a 5% token-back reward on the purchase price. 

To guarantee secure and highly compatible payments these tokens are issued on the Ethereum blockchain ERC20 and work flawlessly with most digital wallets. To ensure compliance and transparency to its buyers, the ProperT token has been carefully audited by Certik independent crypto auditing firm.

*Tokens equal to 5% of purchases made with the Token are awarded subject to a weekly cap calculated at an annual rate of 10% of each year’s new release.

Benefits of using ProperT

Convert your crypto to ProperT to make purchases

Buy any good or service at a ForumPay-enabled merchant or business

Receive a 5% token-back reward

To guarantee secure and highly compatible payments these tokens are issued on the Ethereum blockchain ERC20 and work flawlessly with most digital wallets. Finally, to ensure compliance and transparency to its buyers, the ProperT token has been carefully audited by Certik independent crypto auditing firm.

About ForumPay

Driving utility through merchant acceptance

ProperT’s success will come from its fungibility and overall acceptance in the market. Traditionally, cryptocurrencies were primarily used to store value. However, by partnering with ForumPay, ProperT tokens function like any other currency and can be used to transact everyday goods and services; a critical differentiating factor in the crypto space!

This is why we enlist your help to drive this initiative further and support broad merchant acceptance. Support ProperT by growing ForumPay’s merchant network to increase the token’s circulation and give customers access to the 5% token-back rewards program. 

Join ForumPay’s referral program today and earn commissions on payments processed by merchants you bring in.

Why spend and accept
ProperT transactions

Buyers

ProperT is a solution that is native to crypto. It enables crypto-holders to convert their crypto-currency through the ProperT dashboard and make purchases in ForumPay-supported merchants and businesses. ProperT works like any other currency that can be used to buy goods, services or real estate, with the additional benefit of receiving a 5% token-back reward for every purchase made. ProperT is the first token-back reward program and has been designed in a way that user experience is easy, fast and secure.

Merchants

Offer a rewards program that prizes your customer with a 5% token-back for any purchase at no cost to you. Stand out among your competition and offer this unique reward to attract new customers.

  • · Over 400 Million Digital wallets looking to spend
  • · Crypto consumers spend 2x more than the average debit/credit card user
  • · The 5% token-back reward is applied at no cost to the merchant

Product roadmap

Token release
– June 2022

ForumPay referral program
– November 2022

Rewards system launch
– Early 2023

Airdrop
– March 2023

Be part of the drop!

Release schedule

Year 1 through 4

50,000 Tokens released weekly

Year 5 through 8

25,000 Tokens released weekly

Year 9 through 12

12,500 Tokens released weekly

Year 13 through 16

6,250 Tokens released weekly

Every 4 years

Supply Halving

Help make ProperT
the next big thing in crypto!

Onboard merchants

Quick start guide

Download buying instructions
Download buying instructions

Download the Trust Wallet from your app store.
Open the Trust Wallet app and create an account.
Once you are in, tap the ‘+’ icon to add a new token to your wallet.

Input the ProperT token address under ‘Contract Address’:
0xd58B9Ae085F725Ba97B8C30C0d0aeC0ECa47146b
Tap ‘Save’ in the top right corner.

ProperT token (PROPT) will appear in your wallet.
Tap ‘Receive’ to create your wallet address.

Once your address is created, you can deposit or receive PROPT tokens to your Trust Wallet.
Copy your Trust Wallet address.
Important: This is the address where you will receive your tokens.

Purchase tokens using the ProperT buying dashboard, you can buy tokens using crypto or stable coins.
Download the buying instructions down below for more guidance.

Use your ProperTs at any ForumPay powered location and get 5% token-back rewards.

Join the community

My sister and I buy and flip homes, and since we like to buy multiple homes at once, we decided to check out ProperT, and it was worth it. We can buy homes in a matter of days without dealing with the bank, and the 5% token back reward upped our profit margin by that much on each buy. I think we’ve literally doubled our turnaround time - we even sold two of the homes with ProperT to a couple and a family. Highly recommend!
Margaret King
Tyler, TX
In 2014, I got into crypto and turned three figures into six. With the current global economy, I decided to invest my crypto earnings in real estate. It irks me that most agencies insist I cash out my crypto, but as a long hauler, that’s not an option for me. I ended up Googling “where to buy a home with crypto,” and ProperT caught my attention… I mean, 5% back on a nearly $300,000 investment without having to deposit my crypto into my bank account? Sold!
Sawyer Janssen
Littleton, CO
